channel.title: Traveling log on The J Word
channel.description: Recent content in Traveling log on The J Word

item.title: Labor Rights Holiday
item.description: Things always change on the way of your traveling journey. This time, we kept changing our plan because of some unexpected things, such as traffic jam, road condition, and etc; but it may not be a bad thing to change your plan. 🚗 Car selection Tank 300 🧭 Self-driving map ðŸ‘£Total mileageï¼šAbout 2,000 kms 🎬 Videos Golden Sunset Clip-Vlog 📸 Some moments

item.title: Sichuan-Gansu-Qinghai Grand Loop
item.description: It was a amazing and impressive golden holiday. We haven't had such a crazy time in a long time. This time, 7 days, one car and three people, passing through forests, lakes, mountains and glaciers, was an unforgettable experience for us. 🚗 Car selection Toyota (T-ROC) 🧭 Self-driving map ðŸ‘£Total mileageï¼šAbout 3,000 kms 📸 Some moments

item.title: Rainâ€™s Afterglow
item.description: At USTC after a rainstorm, I tried to take a time-lapse of a rainbow while having dinner, so I left my camera next to the window. Although there was no rainbow in the end, the finished video was quite a surprise!ðŸ˜„ Video Your browser does not support the video tag. by Jack Wu

item.title: Northern Sichuan
item.description: Honestly, it's my very first time to come to the northern of Sichuan province. We spend three days this time, driving for 1,500 kms and never expected such endless happy.ðŸ˜„ 🚗 Car selection Toyota RAV4 🧭 Self-driving map ðŸ‘£Total mileageï¼šAbout 1,500 kms 📸 Some moments

item.title: Sichuan Grand Loop
item.description: Driving through western Sichuan, the winding roads reveal new scenery at every turn. The road is unpredictable, but each unknown holds a little surprise. 🚗 Car selection Borgward (BX5) 🧭 Self-driving map ðŸ‘£Total mileageï¼šAbout 2,000 kms 📸 Some moments
